biotools.summary: Tool for assembling robust haplotype regions given alignments (from de-novo assembly or mapping to a reference) of genetically diverse sequence data. It compares each sequence to every other, and groups sequences together into sets that don’t have any conflicts (minimum coloring of the sequence ‘conflict graph’).

bioschemas.name: Hapler
